column4: i need a virtual machine that supports pci. any suggestions ?
to use xen.  xp wants me for special hardware.
any other vmachine that supports pci
any other vmachine that supports pci port
what? Xen requires xp? one from Novell does not require xp eh?
xen require special hardware to run xp
curious what special hardware is required to run xp on Xen?
check the xen site. it says . it needs special processor for multi os
dont quote me, i think they meant it is targeted for dual core processors, but it didnt say it will not run on single core cpu's
- i need you require a processor with the virtualization extensions (that is, it has the vmx flag and virtualization is enabled in bios).      to run xen. by the way dont you pvt ?
usually i dont go private because i thought i cant get pvt messages when unregistered..
i dont know those fllags as i dont have a dual core cpu
to use xen. i must have that
i dont think i can get private messages, am not regitered user
